snippet:
proof fn lemma_count_true_monotone(f: spec_fn(int) -> bool, i: int, n: int)
        requires 0 <= i <= n
        ensures spec_count_true(f, i) <= spec_count_true(f, n)
        decreases n - i

proof fn lemma_sum_of_monotone(i: int, n: int, f: spec_fn(int) -> nat)
        requires 0 <= i <= n
        ensures spec_sum_of(i, f) <= spec_sum_of(n, f)
        decreases n - i

proof fn lemma_count_true_bound(f: spec_fn(int) -> bool, n: int)
        requires n >= 0
        ensures spec_count_true(f, n) <= n as nat
        decreases n

fn from_matrix(matrix: ArraySeqMtEphS<ArraySeqMtEphS<bool>>) -> (result: Self)
            requires
                forall|i: int| #![auto] 0 <= i < matrix.spec_len() ==>
                    matrix.spec_index(i).spec_len() == matrix.spec_len()
            ensures
                result.spec_wf(),
                result.spec_n() == matrix.spec_len(),
                forall|u: int, v: int| #![auto]
                    0 <= u < matrix.spec_len() && 0 <= v < matrix.spec_len()
                    ==> result.spec_edge(u, v) == matrix.spec_index(u).spec_index(v);

fn out_neighbors(&self, u: N) -> (neighbors: ArraySeqMtEphS<N>)
            requires self.spec_wf(), u < self.spec_n()
            ensures
                forall|k: int| #![auto] 0 <= k < neighbors.spec_len()
                    ==> neighbors.spec_index(k) < self.spec_n()
                        && self.spec_edge(u as int, neighbors.spec_index(k) as int),
                forall|v: int| #![auto] 0 <= v < self.spec_n() && self.spec_edge(u as int, v)
                    ==> exists|k: int| #![auto]
                        0 <= k < neighbors.spec_len() && neighbors.spec_index(k) == v as N;

fn set_edge(&mut self, u: N, v: N, exists: B)
            requires
                old(self).spec_wf(),
                u < old(self).spec_n(),
                v < old(self).spec_n(),
            ensures
                self.spec_wf(),
                self.spec_n() == old(self).spec_n(),
                self.spec_edge(u as int, v as int) == exists,
                forall|i: int, j: int| #![auto]
                    0 <= i < old(self).spec_n() && 0 <= j < old(self).spec_n()
                    && !(i == u as int && j == v as int)
                    ==> self.spec_edge(i, j) == old(self).spec_edge(i, j);

fn complement(&self) -> (result: Self)
            requires self.spec_wf()
            ensures
                result.spec_wf(),
                result.spec_n() == self.spec_n(),
                forall|i: int, j: int| #![auto]
                    0 <= i < self.spec_n() && 0 <= j < self.spec_n()
                    ==> result.spec_edge(i, j) == (i != j && !self.spec_edge(i, j));

proof fn lemma_count_true_monotone(f: spec_fn(int) -> bool, i: int, n: int)
        requires 0 <= i <= n
        ensures spec_count_true(f, i) <= spec_count_true(f, n)
        decreases n - i

proof fn lemma_sum_of_monotone(i: int, n: int, f: spec_fn(int) -> nat)
        requires 0 <= i <= n
        ensures spec_sum_of(i, f) <= spec_sum_of(n, f)
        decreases n - i

proof fn lemma_count_true_bound(f: spec_fn(int) -> bool, n: int)
        requires n >= 0
        ensures spec_count_true(f, n) <= n as nat
        decreases n

fn out_neighbors(&self, u: N) -> (neighbors: ArraySeqMtPerS<N>)
            requires self.spec_wf()
            ensures
                u < self.spec_n() ==> (
                    (forall|k: int| #![auto] 0 <= k < neighbors.spec_len()
                        ==> neighbors.spec_index(k) < self.spec_n()
                            && self.spec_edge(u as int, neighbors.spec_index(k) as int))
                    && (forall|v: int| #![auto] 0 <= v < self.spec_n() && self.spec_edge(u as int, v)
                        ==> exists|k: int| #![auto]
                            0 <= k < neighbors.spec_len() && neighbors.spec_index(k) == v as N)
                ),
                u >= self.spec_n() ==> neighbors.spec_len() == 0;

fn complement(&self) -> (result: Self)
            requires self.spec_wf()
            ensures
                result.spec_wf(),
                result.spec_n() == self.spec_n(),
                forall|i: int, j: int| #![auto]
                    0 <= i < self.spec_n() && 0 <= j < self.spec_n()
                    ==> result.spec_edge(i, j) == (i != j && !self.spec_edge(i, j));

proof fn lemma_count_true_monotone(f: spec_fn(int) -> bool, i: int, n: int)
        requires 0 <= i <= n
        ensures spec_count_true(f, i) <= spec_count_true(f, n)
        decreases n - i

        requires 0 <= i <= n

        decreases n - i

                    matrix.spec_index(i).spec_len() == matrix.spec_len()

                result.spec_n() == matrix.spec_len(),

                    ==> result.spec_edge(u, v) == matrix.spec_index(u).spec_index(v);

            requires self.spec_wf(), u < self.spec_n()
            ensures
                forall|k: int| #![auto] 0 <= k < neighbors.spec_len()
                    ==> neighbors.spec_index(k) < self.spec_n()
                        && self.spec_edge(u as int, neighbors.spec_index(k) as int),

                    ==> exists|k: int| #![auto]
                        0 <= k < neighbors.spec_len() && neighbors.spec_index(k) == v as N;

            requires
                old(self).spec_wf(),

                v < old(self).spec_n(),
            ensures
                self.spec_wf(),
                self.spec_n() == old(self).spec_n(),
                self.spec_edge(u as int, v as int) == exists,
                forall|i: int, j: int| #![auto]
                    0 <= i < old(self).spec_n() && 0 <= j < old(self).spec_n()
                    && !(i == u as int && j == v as int)
                    ==> self.spec_edge(i, j) == old(self).spec_edge(i, j);

fn complement(&self) -> (result: Self)
            requires self.spec_wf()
            ensures
                result.spec_wf(),
                result.spec_n() == self.spec_n(),
                forall|i: int, j: int| #![auto]
                    0 <= i < self.spec_n() && 0 <= j < self.spec_n()
                    ==> result.spec_edge(i, j) == (i != j && !self.spec_edge(i, j));

proof fn lemma_count_true_monotone(f: spec_fn(int) -> bool, i: int, n: int)
        requires 0 <= i <= n
        ensures spec_count_true(f, i) <= spec_count_true(f, n)
        decreases n - i

proof fn lemma_sum_of_monotone(i: int, n: int, f: spec_fn(int) -> nat)
        requires 0 <= i <= n
        ensures spec_sum_of(i, f) <= spec_sum_of(n, f)
        decreases n - i

proof fn lemma_count_true_bound(f: spec_fn(int) -> bool, n: int)
        requires n >= 0
        ensures spec_count_true(f, n) <= n as nat
        decreases n

fn from_matrix(matrix: ArraySeqStPerS<ArraySeqStPerS<bool>>) -> (result: Self)
            requires
                forall|i: int| #![auto] 0 <= i < matrix.spec_len() ==>
                    matrix.spec_index(i).spec_len() == matrix.spec_len()
            ensures
                result.spec_wf(),
                result.spec_n() == matrix.spec_len(),
                forall|u: int, v: int| #![auto]
                    0 <= u < matrix.spec_len() && 0 <= v < matrix.spec_len()
                    ==> result.spec_edge(u, v) == matrix.spec_index(u).spec_index(v);

fn out_neighbors(&self, u: N) -> (neighbors: ArraySeqStPerS<N>)
            requires self.spec_wf(), u < self.spec_n()
            ensures
                forall|k: int| #![auto] 0 <= k < neighbors.spec_len()
                    ==> neighbors.spec_index(k) < self.spec_n()
                        && self.spec_edge(u as int, neighbors.spec_index(k) as int),
                forall|v: int| #![auto] 0 <= v < self.spec_n() && self.spec_edge(u as int, v)
                    ==> exists|k: int| #![auto]
                        0 <= k < neighbors.spec_len() && neighbors.spec_index(k) == v as N;

fn set_edge(&self, u: N, v: N, exists: B) -> (result: Self)
            requires
                self.spec_wf(),
                u < self.spec_n(),
                v < self.spec_n(),
            ensures
                result.spec_wf(),
                result.spec_n() == self.spec_n(),
                result.spec_edge(u as int, v as int) == exists,
                forall|i: int, j: int| #![auto]
                    0 <= i < self.spec_n() && 0 <= j < self.spec_n()
                    && !(i == u as int && j == v as int)
                    ==> result.spec_edge(i, j) == self.spec_edge(i, j);

fn complement(&self) -> (result: Self)
            requires self.spec_wf()
            ensures
                result.spec_wf(),
                result.spec_n() == self.spec_n(),
                forall|i: int, j: int| #![auto]
                    0 <= i < self.spec_n() && 0 <= j < self.spec_n()
                    ==> result.spec_edge(i, j) == (i != j && !self.spec_edge(i, j));

proof fn lemma_sum_of_monotone(i: int, n: int, f: spec_fn(int) -> nat)
        requires 0 <= i <= n
        ensures spec_sum_of(i, f) <= spec_sum_of(n, f)
        decreases n - i

proof fn lemma_sum_of_unfold(i: int, f: spec_fn(int) -> nat)
        requires i >= 0
        ensures spec_sum_of(i + 1, f) == f(i) + spec_sum_of(i, f)

fn num_vertices(&self) -> (n: N)
            ensures n as nat == self.spec_num_vertices();

fn set_edge(&mut self, u: N, v: N, exists: B)
            requires
                u < old(self).spec_num_vertices(),
                v < old(self).spec_num_vertices(),
            ensures
                self.spec_num_vertices() == old(self).spec_num_vertices(),
                forall|i: int| #![auto] 0 <= i < old(self).spec_num_vertices() && i != u as int
                    ==> self.spec_degree(i) == old(self).spec_degree(i),
                forall|i: int, j: int| #![auto]
                    0 <= i < old(self).spec_num_vertices() && i != u as int
                    && 0 <= j < old(self).spec_degree(i)
                    ==> self.spec_neighbor(i, j) == old(self).spec_neighbor(i, j),
                exists ==> (exists|j: int| #![auto]
                    0 <= j < self.spec_degree(u as int)
                    && self.spec_neighbor(u as int, j) == v),
                !exists ==> forall|j: int| #![auto]
                    0 <= j < self.spec_degree(u as int)
                    ==> self.spec_neighbor(u as int, j) != v;

proof fn lemma_sum_of_monotone(i: int, n: int, f: spec_fn(int) -> nat)
        requires 0 <= i <= n
        ensures spec_sum_of(i, f) <= spec_sum_of(n, f)
        decreases n - i

proof fn lemma_sum_of_unfold(i: int, f: spec_fn(int) -> nat)
        requires i >= 0
        ensures spec_sum_of(i + 1, f) == f(i) + spec_sum_of(i, f)

fn num_vertices(&self) -> (n: N)
            ensures n as nat == self.spec_num_vertices();

proof fn lemma_sum_of_monotone(i: int, n: int, f: spec_fn(int) -> nat)
        requires 0 <= i <= n
        ensures spec_sum_of(i, f) <= spec_sum_of(n, f)
        decreases n - i

proof fn lemma_sum_of_unfold(i: int, f: spec_fn(int) -> nat)
        requires i >= 0
        ensures spec_sum_of(i + 1, f) == f(i) + spec_sum_of(i, f)

fn from_seq(adj: ArraySeqStEphS<ArraySeqStEphS<N>>) -> (result: Self)
            ensures
                result.spec_num_vertices() == adj.spec_len(),
                forall|i: int| #![auto] 0 <= i < adj.spec_len() ==>
                    result.spec_degree(i) == adj.spec_index(i).spec_len(),
                forall|i: int, j: int| #![auto] 0 <= i < adj.spec_len()
                    && 0 <= j < adj.spec_index(i).spec_len()
                    ==> result.spec_neighbor(i, j) == adj.spec_index(i).spec_index(j);

fn num_vertices(&self) -> (n: N)
            ensures n as nat == self.spec_num_vertices();

fn set_neighbors(&mut self, v: N, neighbors: ArraySeqStEphS<N>)
            requires v < old(self).spec_num_vertices()
            ensures
                self.spec_num_vertices() == old(self).spec_num_vertices(),
                self.spec_degree(v as int) == neighbors.spec_len(),
                forall|j: int| #![auto] 0 <= j < neighbors.spec_len()
                    ==> self.spec_neighbor(v as int, j) == neighbors.spec_index(j),
                forall|i: int| #![auto] 0 <= i < old(self).spec_num_vertices() && i != v as int
                    ==> self.spec_degree(i) == old(self).spec_degree(i),
                forall|i: int, j: int| #![auto]
                    0 <= i < old(self).spec_num_vertices() && i != v as int
                    && 0 <= j < old(self).spec_degree(i)
                    ==> self.spec_neighbor(i, j) == old(self).spec_neighbor(i, j);

fn set_edge(&mut self, u: N, v: N, exists: B)
            requires
                u < old(self).spec_num_vertices(),
                v < old(self).spec_num_vertices(),
            ensures
                self.spec_num_vertices() == old(self).spec_num_vertices(),
                forall|i: int| #![auto] 0 <= i < old(self).spec_num_vertices() && i != u as int
                    ==> self.spec_degree(i) == old(self).spec_degree(i),
                forall|i: int, j: int| #![auto]
                    0 <= i < old(self).spec_num_vertices() && i != u as int
                    && 0 <= j < old(self).spec_degree(i)
                    ==> self.spec_neighbor(i, j) == old(self).spec_neighbor(i, j),
                exists ==> (exists|j: int| #![auto]
                    0 <= j < self.spec_degree(u as int)
                    && self.spec_neighbor(u as int, j) == v),
                !exists ==> forall|j: int| #![auto]
                    0 <= j < self.spec_degree(u as int)
                    ==> self.spec_neighbor(u as int, j) != v;

proof fn lemma_sum_of_monotone(i: int, n: int, f: spec_fn(int) -> nat)
        requires 0 <= i <= n
        ensures spec_sum_of(i, f) <= spec_sum_of(n, f)
        decreases n - i

proof fn lemma_sum_of_unfold(i: int, f: spec_fn(int) -> nat)
        requires i >= 0
        ensures spec_sum_of(i + 1, f) == f(i) + spec_sum_of(i, f)

fn from_seq(adj: ArraySeqStPerS<ArraySeqStPerS<N>>) -> (result: Self)
            ensures
                result.spec_num_vertices() == adj.spec_len(),
                forall|i: int| #![auto] 0 <= i < adj.spec_len() ==>
                    result.spec_degree(i) == adj.spec_index(i).spec_len(),
                forall|i: int, j: int| #![auto] 0 <= i < adj.spec_len()
                    && 0 <= j < adj.spec_index(i).spec_len()
                    ==> result.spec_neighbor(i, j) == adj.spec_index(i).spec_index(j);

fn num_vertices(&self) -> (n: N)
            ensures n as nat == self.spec_num_vertices();

fn insert_edge(&self, u: N, v: N) -> (result: Self)
            requires
                u < self.spec_num_vertices(),
                v < self.spec_num_vertices(),
            ensures
                result.spec_num_vertices() == self.spec_num_vertices(),
                forall|i: int| #![auto] 0 <= i < self.spec_num_vertices() && i != u as int
                    ==> result.spec_degree(i) == self.spec_degree(i),
                forall|i: int, j: int| #![auto]
                    0 <= i < self.spec_num_vertices() && i != u as int
                    && 0 <= j < self.spec_degree(i)
                    ==> result.spec_neighbor(i, j) == self.spec_neighbor(i, j),
                exists|j: int| #![auto]
                    0 <= j < result.spec_degree(u as int)
                    && result.spec_neighbor(u as int, j) == v;

fn delete_edge(&self, u: N, v: N) -> (result: Self)
            requires u < self.spec_num_vertices()
            ensures
                result.spec_num_vertices() == self.spec_num_vertices(),
                forall|i: int| #![auto] 0 <= i < self.spec_num_vertices() && i != u as int
                    ==> result.spec_degree(i) == self.spec_degree(i),
                forall|i: int, j: int| #![auto]
                    0 <= i < self.spec_num_vertices() && i != u as int
                    && 0 <= j < self.spec_degree(i)
                    ==> result.spec_neighbor(i, j) == self.spec_neighbor(i, j),
                forall|j: int| #![auto]
                    0 <= j < result.spec_degree(u as int)
                    ==> result.spec_neighbor(u as int, j) != v;
fn empty()                          -> Self;
fn num_vertices(&self)              -> N;

fn has_edge(&self, u: &V, v: &V) -> (found: B)
            ensures found == (self.spec_adj().dom().contains(u@) && self.spec_adj()[u@].contains(v@));
fn out_degree(&self, u: &V)         -> N;

fn insert_vertex(&self, v: V) -> (result: Self)
            ensures result.spec_adj().dom().contains(v@);

fn delete_vertex(&self, v: &V) -> (result: Self)
            ensures !result.spec_adj().dom().contains(v@);
fn default() -> Self { Self::empty() }

proof fn lemma_sum_adj_sizes_monotone<VV>(m: Map<VV, Set<VV>>, sub: Set<VV>)
        requires m.dom().finite(), sub.finite(), sub.subset_of(m.dom())
        ensures spec_sum_adj_sizes(m) >= 0
fn empty()                                                     -> Self;
fn from_table(table: OrderedTableStEph<V, AVLTreeSetStEph<V>>) -> Self;
fn num_vertices(&self)                                         -> N;
fn vertices(&self)                                             -> AVLTreeSetStEph<V>;
fn has_edge(&self, u: &V, v: &V)                               -> B;
fn out_neighbors(&self, u: &V)                                 -> AVLTreeSetStEph<V>;
fn out_degree(&self, u: &V)                                    -> N;
fn insert_vertex(&mut self, v: V);
fn delete_vertex(&mut self, v: &V);
fn insert_edge(&mut self, u: V, v: V);
fn delete_edge(&mut self, u: &V, v: &V);
fn empty()                                                     -> Self;
fn from_table(table: OrderedTableStPer<V, AVLTreeSetStPer<V>>) -> Self;
fn num_vertices(&self)                                         -> N;

fn vertices(&self) -> (result: AVLTreeSetStPer<V>)
            ensures result@ == self.spec_adj().dom();

fn has_edge(&self, u: &V, v: &V) -> (found: B)
            ensures found == (self.spec_adj().dom().contains(u@) && self.spec_adj()[u@].contains(v@));
fn out_degree(&self, u: &V)                                    -> N;

fn insert_vertex(&self, v: V) -> (result: Self)
            ensures result.spec_adj().dom().contains(v@);

fn delete_vertex(&self, v: &V) -> (result: Self)
            ensures !result.spec_adj().dom().contains(v@);
fn empty()                                                                        -> Self;
fn from_vertices_and_edges(v: AVLTreeSetMtPer<V>, e: AVLTreeSetMtPer<Pair<V, V>>) -> Self;
fn num_vertices(&self)                                                            -> N;
fn num_edges(&self)                                                               -> N;
fn vertices(&self)                                                                -> &AVLTreeSetMtPer<V>;
fn edges(&self)                                                                   -> &AVLTreeSetMtPer<Pair<V, V>>;
fn has_edge(&self, u: &V, v: &V)                                                  -> B;

fn out_neighbors(&self, u: &V) -> (result: AVLTreeSetMtPer<V>)
            ensures result@ == Set::new(|v: <V as View>::V| self.edges@.contains((u@, v)));
fn out_degree(&self, u: &V)                                                       -> N;
fn insert_vertex(&self, v: V)                                                     -> Self;

fn delete_vertex(&self, v: &V) -> (result: Self)
            ensures !result.vertices@.contains(v@);
fn insert_edge(&self, u: V, v: V)                                                 -> Self;
fn delete_edge(&self, u: &V, v: &V)                                               -> Self;
fn default() -> Self { Self::empty() }
fn empty()                                                                        -> Self;
fn from_vertices_and_edges(v: AVLTreeSetStEph<V>, e: AVLTreeSetStEph<Pair<V, V>>) -> Self;
fn num_vertices(&self)                                                            -> N;
fn num_edges(&self)                                                               -> N;
fn vertices(&self)                                                                -> &AVLTreeSetStEph<V>;
fn edges(&self)                                                                   -> &AVLTreeSetStEph<Pair<V, V>>;
fn has_edge(&self, u: &V, v: &V)                                                  -> B;

fn out_neighbors(&self, u: &V) -> (result: AVLTreeSetStEph<V>)
            ensures result@ == self.spec_out_neighbors(u@);
fn out_degree(&self, u: &V)                                                       -> N;
fn insert_vertex(&mut self, v: V);

fn delete_vertex(&mut self, v: &V)
            ensures !self.spec_vertices().contains(v@);
fn insert_edge(&mut self, u: V, v: V);
fn delete_edge(&mut self, u: &V, v: &V);
fn empty()                                                                        -> Self;
fn from_vertices_and_edges(v: AVLTreeSetStPer<V>, e: AVLTreeSetStPer<Pair<V, V>>) -> Self;
fn num_vertices(&self)                                                            -> N;
fn num_edges(&self)                                                               -> N;
fn vertices(&self)                                                                -> &AVLTreeSetStPer<V>;
fn edges(&self)                                                                   -> &AVLTreeSetStPer<Pair<V, V>>;
fn has_edge(&self, u: &V, v: &V)                                                  -> B;

fn out_neighbors(&self, u: &V) -> (result: AVLTreeSetStPer<V>)
            ensures result@ == self.spec_out_neighbors(u@);
fn out_degree(&self, u: &V)                                                       -> N;
fn insert_vertex(&self, v: V)                                                     -> Self;

fn delete_vertex(&self, v: &V) -> (result: Self)
            ensures !result.vertices@.contains(v@);
fn insert_edge(&self, u: V, v: V)                                                 -> Self;
fn delete_edge(&self, u: &V, v: &V)                                               -> Self;
